Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: In certain missions and bosses in Sonic Generations, settings for Sonic's physics have overrides. Enable this option if you are playing the standard game to remove redundant overrides, allowing Sonic to handle more consistently.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Adjust Modern Sonic's physics settings and Homing Attack button.
Load stage files recommended for use with the standard game. This setting also addresses a glitch that can occur in Crisis City Act 2.
Use this mod's Classic Sonic physics settings. Handling will have some differences like Spinning lasting longer.
Use Sonic Generations's physics settings or settings from another mod.
Use Unleashed's physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button.
Use Unleashed's physics settings with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button.

SonicOptions.DisplayName: Preview Build w/Homing Attack on Boost
Description: Use physics settings based on the Unleashed Preview Build with the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button. Some differences include a higher jump, faster Wall Jump, and slower Light Speed Dash. Level design may not function as intended with these settings.

SonicOptions.DisplayName: Preview Build w/Homing Attack on Jump
Description: Use physics settings based on the Unleashed Preview Build with the Homing Attack mapped to the Jump button. Some differences include a higher jump, faster Wall Jump, and slower Light Speed Dash. Level design may not function as intended with these settings.
Use Sonic Generations's complete physics settings or settings from another mod.
